info.game_comments: Missing introductions and first 20 clues of the Jeopardy! Round.

(6, 1).clue: World Book says only about 10% of the blind find one of these useful

(6, 2).clue: It's a self-propelled aerial projectile controlled in flight internally or by remote control

(5, 3).clue: The name of this soap opera can be traced back to a Franciscan mission established in 1786

(6, 3).clue: The marks used to orient lettering, or the rules or policy set up for you to follow

(1, 1).clue: These arachnids feed off dogs & can give Rocky Mountain spotted fever to humans

(3, 1).clue: Circa 8 A.D., Wang Mang seized this country's throne & founded his own dynasty

(4, 1).clue: The only palindrome that applies to a sibling

(1, 3).clue: Tiny arachnid whose name has come to mean anything small, especially an amount of money

(4, 3).clue: Of the verbs to have, to do, or to be, the one whose past tense is a palindrome

(1, 4).clue: The only sign of the zodiac whose symbol is an arachnid
